Experienced Software Engineer eager to deploy well crafted and test driven solutions to solve interesting and challenging problems.

Experience

Software Engineer II

Deliveroo - London, United Kingdom

Part of a multi disciplinary team that looks after the order tracker service. Led the successful migration to a new config tool, revolutionizing feature experimentation and enhancing the team's precision in toggling experiences. Navigated early adopter challenges through effective team communication. Improved the consumer experience by optimizing deliveries involving multiple riders. Elevated the reliability of the order tracker, particularly in worst-case scenarios, through the implementation of enhancements ensuring accurate information in instances of failed deliveries. Contributed to a more user-friendly and dynamic iOS app experience by enhancing Live Activities. Implemented rider vehicle information to ensure compliance with international regulations, showcasing dedication to regulatory adherence and global operational standards. Executed a comprehensive refactor of stack order logic, optimizing system efficiency and facilitating enhanced performance for different deliveries picked up by the same rider. Contributed to out-of-hours support, swiftly identifying and resolving live incidents utilizing monitoring tools.

Tech stack: Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Golang, DynamoDB, Kafka, Redis, AWS, Docker, Terraform, Git, CircleCI, Datadog, Snowflake, Sentry, PagerDuty, Phrase

Associate Software Engineer

ASOS.com - London, United Kingdom

Part of a small backend team that looks after two golden-thread services that serve hundreds of thousands of requests per day, providing sizing and pricing data to web, mobile apps and feeds consumers. Size Guides feature owner with responsibilities on discovery, refinement, architecture, development and deployment. Adheres to Kanban principles to develop highly scaled and highly available microservices in an event-driven architecture seamlessly and continuously deployed to the cloud. Advocate of best code practices like TDD, DRY, YAGNI and SOLID. Member of the out of hours support team, identifying and resolving live incidents with the help of monitoring tools.

Developed and implemented HR, payroll and other kinds of integrations using .NET C#. Responsible for running, supporting and enhancing the data migration toolkit, based in T-SQL. Customer facing interaction, either remotely or on site to gather requirements, propose and deploy solutions.
